topic.title: How to use the iPad Pro Rentals

body.p: Using the iPad Pro is a simple process once you know how to turn the product on and off, and how to find the application you want.

li.p: To turn the iPad Pro on, hold down the button on the right side of the device. Continue holding down this button until a white Apple appears on the screen.
Once you have the iPad on, press the Home button on the screen of the device.
On the display you will see a screen that reads "Slide to open". Slide your finger on the screen.
Once you are on the Home screen, slide your finger down from the top of the screen down towards the Home button. This will reveal the Search bar.
Type your desired Application into the Search bar, and click on the icon when it appears.
